    (SBAR
      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)

            (NP (PRP us))))

        (NP (NNP Jit) (NNP ta) (NN qio) (NN tio) (NN jit))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (CD two) (NNS brothers))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WP who))
        (S
          (VP (VBP own)
            (NP (DT this) (NN stall))))))
    (VP (VBP tell)
      (NP (PRP me))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (S
            (NP (DT this) (NN concept))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (VP (VBN inspired)
                (PP (IN by)
                  (NP
                    (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS travels))

                      (NP
                        (NP
                          (NP (NNP Bangkok) (POS 's))
                          (NNP Chinatown))

                          (-RRB- -RRB-)))))))))

                        (NP (NN something))

                                (VP (TO to)

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ handmade) (NNS fishballs))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP (NN instance))))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (ADJP (RB specially) (JJ sourced)
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a)
              (ADJP (RB well) (VBN known))
              (JJ fishball) (NN maker))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (ADVP (RB still))
                (VP (VBZ produces)
                  (NP (NN everything))
                  (PP (IN by)
                    (NP (NN hand))))))))))
    (. .)))

amod(fishballs-3, handmade-2)

            (JJ different) (NNS types))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (JJ instant) (NNS noodles)))))

        (S
          (ADVP (RB finally))
          (VP (VBG choosing)
            (NP (CD one))

                (NP (JJS best))
                (VP (VBZ reminds)

                        (S
